name: calculate_displacement
description: Calculates the displacement of an object considering constant acceleration, air resistance, and initial position.

initial_velocity.description: The initial velocity of the object (m/s).

acceleration.description: The constant acceleration of the object (m/sÂ²).

initial_position.description: The initial position of the object (m). Defaults to 0.0.

mass.description: The mass of the object (kg). Defaults to 1.0.
